channel.description: Week 2 Announcements This Week Mon: Lab 1 Due 7 PM Wed: Discord Intro 11:59 PM Wed: Week 2 Questions 11:59 PM Thur: Speaker: Seth Galitzer 3:30 PM Next Week: Lab 2 Monday 7 PM Discord Introduce Yourself Ask quick questions Chat with other students Discuss news & current events Reminders https://discordbot.cs.ksu.edu Speaker: Seth Galitzer CS System Administrator since 2006 B.S. in Computer Science (K-State) Manages all CS Systems & Labs Lab 2 Redo Lab 1 using Puppet Reinstall OS, Install Puppet, Make Snapshot Write Puppet Manifest & Test Keep it Simple!
